summary: Lions and Dragons {Star Wars/Game of Thrones Crossover}
title: Lions and Dragons {Star Wars/Game of Thrones Crossover}
description:
Tyrion has been accused of killing King Joffrey and has been sentenced to death. His brother, Jaime comes to his rescue and helps him escape. Jaime is then charged with treason and is executed.
There is now a reward for Tyrion’s return all throughout the Seven Kingdoms. He’s wanted dead or alive.
Tyrion is captured by the Targaryens, but they want more than what the Lannisters are offering. Negotiations begin between the Houses.

This is an Obikin fanfic!

summary:
Lamalla Rann: I‘ve got enough to bribe a smaller army, though. You for hire?
Smuggler: I could always use more credits.
Lamalla...
body:
Lamalla Rann: I‘ve got enough to bribe a smaller army, though. You for hire?

Smuggler: I could always use more credits.

Lamalla Rann: Fantastic, good to see someone with the complete lack of scruples needed to protect justice and freedom in the Republic.

blog.name: steamedtangerine
blog.title: Steamed Tangerine
blog.description: Somewhere amongst all the UFOs, Rubik's Cubes, sasquatch, flygirls, passive-aggressive mutants, cybernetic lawmen, and reconstituted nuggets, I make some bizarre connections. Unless you are a grown-up naughty Catholic youth group kid who used to steal condoms from his parent's dresser drawers, some of the NSFW content here might not hit you right. Some gifs work better viewing them in archive.

title: Filthy junk traders - Rey’s parents
body:
From IMDB:

Rey: [in tears] They were nobody.

Kylo Ren: They were filthy junk traders. Sold you off for drinking money. They’re dead in a pauper’s grave in the Jakku desert. You come from nothing. You’re nothing. But not to me.

They came from nothing. They are nothing. But not to Rey.

Rey spent her entire life waiting for her parents. They mean something to her. They matter. Their occupation, their indulgences, and their weaknesses are irrelevant to a child. If IX has any overarching theme aside from Reylo, it must be forgiveness of parents - Rey’s, Ben’s, and the First Order (on behalf of Finn).

The importance of these people in the lives of their children must be accepted by those children. We must not embrace ‘Let the past die, kill it if you have to’. That is an evil philosophy and shallow. It inhibits growth. Failure is the greatest legacy of the Jedi and of all masters. Yoda tells Luke to pass on his failure and what he’s learned from it so his students can understand it. They also must understand the fallibility of heroes, masters, and legends.

It was the death of a parent that started the entire dark path of the Skywalkers. Shmi was a nobody, the kind of person Kylo Ren is urging Rey to dismiss - dead in a desert grave. Yet her death sent Anakin to the dark side to prevent the same from happening to the mother of his children. Rey’s parents matter to her. Even if they were nobodies like herself. 

Even if it’s just her kneeling at a desert grave, putting up a marker to honor the past, I want to see her deal with her past in IX. I want to see Leia forgive Ben. I want to see Finn return to the only family he’s ever known, the First Order, and lead his brothers and sisters in making it a better place for all of them.

That’s what the Star Wars saga needs - family, connection, legacy, honoring the past while moving into the future.

summary: Lo and behold! Chapter 21 isn't all pain and misery. Sorry this is a bit late. Had a bit of an existential crisis yesterday...
body:
Lo and behold! Chapter 21 isn’t all pain and misery.
Sorry this is a bit late. Had a bit of an existential crisis yesterday after I learned that an old classmate of mine had passed away.

Be My Prize

Poe Dameron/Kylo Ren, Poe Dameron/Finn

Poe Dameron is forced to take a vacation and has to leave the Resistance base, and he is not exactly thrilled about it. He soon meets a stranger, who is the definition of “tall, dark, and handsome”, and they are both fascinated with each other. The vacation is suddenly starting to seem less and less like a bore.
However, things can only go downhill from here, when one of the interested parties is a Resistance pilot and the other hails the flag of the First Order.

—

The story starts before the events of The Force Awakens and continues past the the movie.

The fic will update every Saturday until I run out of my buffer, though I will attempt to continue the weekly schedule even after that happens.

summary: Lol everyone talk about how thirsty Kylo seems when he sees Rey for the first time and how hes so affected by her but like no...
body: Lol everyone talk about how thirsty Kylo seems when he sees Rey for the first time and how hes so affected by her but like no one realizes how Rey feels when she grows up in a dead dry planet with probably nothing but scrawny ass malnourished thirsty gross boys and suddenly this legit 6 foot 3, broad ass brick Force User appears in front of her,,, decides to go half nakey on their one on one FaceTime call and he has locks for days AND KILLS one of the most powerful leaders of the FIrst Order to save her ass??? No wonder Rey flies economy in a coffin just to see him

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

title: Has anyone noticed

pasting and cutting pictures takes far too much time than i thought
title: SW Sequel: Friends~
body:
BONUS

:X AM DEYD. 

So, for the characters, just keep the personalities of Kylo Ren/Ben Solo and Rey as is. It’ll be Kylo Ren who’s the spoiled brat who ran away from his own “arranged marriage” and cries a lot LOL haha. (I think it’s funnier that way, don’t you? HAHA)

Do I LOVE the idea? YES.
Would I LOVE to read a fanfiction story on this? YES.
Would I LOVE to write what I envision? YES!
SHOULD I write the fanfiction? NO. :| 
Should someone write the story? YES. <3
